alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 7:24PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cleveland, Grant, northeastern Dallas, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 800 PM CST... At 724 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Dogwood, or 9 miles south of Sheridan, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Malvern... Sheridan... Rison... White Hall... Leola... Carthage... Prattsville... Poyen... Lamont... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Kedron... Warbritton... Thiel... Dogwood... Sulphur Springs... Ain... Lono... Tulip... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson
